Content: Oh thank god I'm not the only one with that problem
It's become really irritating. Apparently when it happens it freezes all of the console buttons including the home button and glitch button
Switch gets the end stick of odd performance issues tbh
This bug_ 1.9 had slow loading for menus (it still has some when you pause the game)_ it could take up to a whole minute just to open a chest or crafting table in 1.9
The switch is more powerful than like 80% of phones people use
I hope a bug comes soon
The game is practically becoming unplayable
This bug apparently has like no effect on mobs
I was fighting a skeleton and a creeper (not anywhere close to me) blew me up
